answers.answer: I am not aware of any pointers to Paxil as causing type 1 diabetes. It is thought that type 1 diabetes is caused by faulty genes (I have read that it is thought by some that we inherit one faulty gene from each parent, hence it doesn't tend to run in families) and an immune system triggered by some virus. Some researchers believe that they have even located some specific viruses that can work to trigger diabetes in these people. I have never read anything about Paxil or any other drug as being the cause.

question: Hi I am wondering if any research has been done to find out if there is a connection in a child getting diabetes if the mother took Paxil during the pregnancy.   My Son was born in 7/03 and got Type 1 Diabetes in 12/05.  Please advise!  Thanks
title: Pregnant taking Paxil, caused Diabetes?
